question: Which organisation has signed MoU with the IISc to create Joint Advanced Technology Program–Center of Excellence?
explanation:
The Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Indian Institute of Science (IISc) Bengaluru to create the Joint Advanced Technology Program–Center of Excellence.
JATP was created by the former Indian President APJ Abdul Kalam in 1983, in which DRDO scientists collaborated with the faculty of IISc. The CoE is to be set up in the premises of IISc, Bangalore.
